main.name: Breahem Bedi
main.description: who is looking for a software developer job to kick start my career in the IT industry
main.bio: Since I was young, I was always fascinated by the day-to-day evolving technology. During high school, I came across an opportunity to pick up programming as a elective, which by far turned out to be the most fun subject. I loved making the programs work the way I wanted to and coming up with fun and creative designs for the front end of my applications. Since then, I have had a growing interest in software engineering, digital designing and learning new ways to code and create unique applications. I have always enjoyed learning new things and am constantly seeking out new learning opportunities. My biggest ambition is to one day have a chance to work on an application that will help improve people's lives on a global scale.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

testimonials.text: I have had the opportunity to work with Breahem on multiple occasions which has always been a pleasure. He is driven and motivated with a consistently positive attitude. Breahem excels at communicating with others and is always willing to work hard until he solves the problem at hand.

Bedi must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
